title: Entire card collection is for sale. Including t205 American Beauty Subset
author: bn2cardz

posts.post_title: Entire card collection is for sale. Including t205 American Beauty Subset
posts.post_content:
I have been listing some stuff recently.  I wanted to state, though, that I am done with the hobby.  If you are a Christian you may understand where I am coming from, but I have been feeling convicted about this hobby becoming my "god".  For this reason I am going to attempt to sell it all so I can refocus my priorities.  

If you have seen me post something that you would like for your collection please reach out to me.  This includes anything from my Lobert back run to my t205 American Beauty Subset and anything in between.  I also do have somethings listed on ebay that I will take fair offers on (more loose than I was in the past, so if you made an offer that I rejected or countered I suggest trying again).

I will be looking into consignments, but wanted to give the site first crack.  

Lobert Run - Already sold the e90-1 and d303 duplicates shown prior to coming to this decision.
[IMG]http://i1118.photobucket.com/albums/k607/bn2cardz/PreWar/LOBERT%20E92%20IMAGE%20RUN/LOBERT%20RUN_zpsufbfqsf4.jpg[/IMG]

t205 American Beauty subset (this only shows a single copy of each, but I do have multiple copies of some)
[IMG]http://i1118.photobucket.com/albums/k607/bn2cardz/PreWar/T-Series/T205ABCollection_zpswg5mu6uy.jpg[/IMG]

I am specifically mentioning these two sub collections because these are the ones that I have most prized, if I can sell from these the rest will be very easy (ripping off the band-aid).  Yet if you know of something else in my collection feel free to reach out to me.

I can be contacted at [url]bn2cardz@gmail.com[/url].

Hi Andy, I respect your decision and I have had the same thoughts myself, but at this time I am still enjoying my collection and I am not ready to sell.

With that being said, would you mind posting a link to your ebay sales?

Thank you,

Rick
well...looks like my miller run will have less competition for most complete non t206 run!!!!  i've always loved seeing it!  best of luck!
My minister made a similar decision with his golden age comic collection. Best of luck and appreciate your reasoning.

I have had a lot of action this afternoon.  Most of the t205 AB set is gone, the buyer only needed to add to their set so I still have some and I will reply to all that were interested after I have all the ones bought from those left.

For those asking for a list of cards.  I wasn't the most organized when it wasn't part of one of my main two interests so I will have to compile a list with photos of what I have.  I just had to get the ball rolling or else I would never do it.
I completely understand. Good luck. If it ain't cards it's money food women exercise and my favorite myself. I too forget to worship that which gives me all of these things.
Do you still have the Gibson AB?

[quote name="T205 GB" post=1595505]Do you still have the Gibson AB?[/QUOTE]

I can answer that because I came knocking about that one too...it's gone (and I didn't get it either).

Cheers,

Richard.

[quote name="T205 GB" post=1595505]Do you still have the Gibson AB?[/QUOTE]

[quote name="cdn_collector" post=1595648]I can answer that because I came knocking about that one too...it's gone (and I didn't get it either).

Cheers,

Richard.[/QUOTE]
